negotiator

Class Deadline

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.Deadline

  • public class Deadline
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the deadline which is a combination of time and rounds deadline. If both are set, the deadline is reached when the first deadline (time or rounds) is reached.
    Author:
    David Festen, W.Pasman

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Deadline(java.lang.Integer time, java.lang.Integer rounds) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Integer getDefaultTimeout()
      get the default time-out for function calls in the agents.
      java.lang.Integer getTimeOrDefaultTimeout()
      Get time out in seconds, or default timeout if time not set.
      java.lang.Integer getTotalRounds()
      returns the total rounds available.
      java.lang.Integer getTotalTime()
      returns the total time available.

      boolean isTime()

    • Constructor Detail

      • Deadline

        public Deadline(java.lang.Integer time,
        java.lang.Integer rounds)

    • Method Detail

      • getTotalTime

        public java.lang.Integer getTotalTime()
        returns the total time available. If <=0 then the total time is undefined and will be ignored.

      • getTotalRounds

        public java.lang.Integer getTotalRounds()
        returns the total rounds available. If <=0 then the total rounds is undefined and will be ignored.

      • isTime

        public boolean isTime()
        Returns:
        true iff the time deadline is >0 and engaged

      • isRounds

        public boolean isRounds()
        Returns:
        true iff the rounds deadline is >0 and engaged

      • getDefaultTimeout

        public java.lang.Integer getDefaultTimeout()
        get the default time-out for function calls in the agents.
        Returns:

      • getTimeOrDefaultTimeout

        public java.lang.Integer getTimeOrDefaultTimeout()
        Get time out in seconds, or default timeout if time not set.
        Returns:
        time out in seconds, always >0.
